item.title: About
item.description: Hi! This is a website for city planners who wish to better understand changes and challenges in their communities using data analysis and visualizations. We write about common planning problems in areas such as housing, transportation, land use, or economic development and demonstrate how data visualizations can give communities tools to address emerging issues. Most of these posts will profile techniques in R, an open-source software that let’s you manipulate and visualize different sources of information.
